comments.body: You need a license_file entry. If the license is not in the upstream package, please make an issue there and then include it in this PR per the instructions here: https://conda-forge.org/docs/meta.html#packaging-the-license-manually

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: 'A Chinese Calendar Library in Pure Python'
